com.i2group.apollo.alertfeedretrievalservice
Interface IAlertFeedRetrievalService

public interface IAlertFeedRetrievalService

A method for retrieving the alert feeds that the user is permitted to see, and which of those the user is subscribed to.

Since:
3.0

Method Summary
 AlertFeedSearchResults searchAlertFeeds(String searchString, FilterInfoList filterInfos, boolean subscribedFeedsOnly, SortInfo sortInfo, int maxResultCount, PageInfo pageInfo)
          Searches the Analysis Repository and retrieves alert feeds that meet a range of criteria.
 

Method Detail

searchAlertFeeds

AlertFeedSearchResults searchAlertFeeds(String searchString,
                                        FilterInfoList filterInfos,
                                        boolean subscribedFeedsOnly,
                                        SortInfo sortInfo,
                                        int maxResultCount,
                                        PageInfo pageInfo)
                                        throws InvalidArgumentException
Searches the Analysis Repository and retrieves alert feeds that meet a range of criteria.

Note: This method is functionally similar to ISearchService.searchAndRetrieve(String, SetInfo, ItemTypeIdList, FilterInfoList, SortInfo, int, PageInfo), except that it only retrieves alert feeds, and it does not permit searches to be constrained to a set.

Parameters:
searchString - A String containing some text that matching alert feeds must contain, or null to match all alert feeds.
filterInfos - The FilterInfoList defining Property and metadata values that matching alert feeds must have, or null to match all alert feeds.
subscribedFeedsOnly - true to constrain the results to alert feeds to which the current user is subscribed; false to include all alert feeds (that match the other criteria) in the results.
sortInfo - A SortInfo determining how the matched alert feeds are to be ordered.
maxResultCount - The maximum number of alert feeds to return to the client.
pageInfo - A PageInfo that specifies which page of results to retrieve.
Returns:
AlertFeedSearchResults containing AlertFeedInfos that provide information about the retrieved alert feeds, as well as Items representing the alert feeds themselves.
Throws:
InvalidArgumentException - If any of the arguments are not valid.
